overview: "Goals for Girls: A story of women with balls” investigates the ignored world of women's football in Argentina.  The women of the Villa 31 and players from different backgrounds reveal that family prejudices combined with complete abandonment by local authorities conspire against the development of a sport that has grown worldwide. These players have to fight on and off the field to ensure that the words of the president of FIFA come true: “the future of football belongs to women”.
title: Mujeres con Pelotas
